name: Fastershare
author: Daniel Färber

sections.description:
If you install this plugin on your blog, your visitors get two buttons below your posts and pages:

  • A Facebook “share” button
  • and a Twitter “tweet” button.

These are not the standard Like- and Tweet-Buttons, which also display how many people have clicked on it so far, but basically pure and simple html-links.

DISADVANTAGE:

  • Less interaction.

ADVANTAGES:

  • It’s faster. Your blog does not have to contact Facebook’s and Twitter’s servers.
  • Better privacy. No information about your visitors is sent to Facebook or Twitter. Nota bene: Facebook’s standard like button allows Facebook to track your visitors even if they do not click on it!
sections.installation:
1. Upload all files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. See result on your blog
sections.faq:
Is the plugin customizable?

Not yet. You can edit the php-code, of course.

short_description: This plugin allows your visitors to share your posts on Facebook and Twitter, without JavaScript or iFrames.
